column2: "I saw it all, clear as day! Looks like the trick is to get the first strike, hit 'em fast and hit 'em hard."
"Almost feels like I got the hang of it just from watchin' ya. I'm gonna hit up Naberius and try it out later."
"Only way it could be better is if I weren't payin' for it. Say, killer, you don't really need a reward, do ya?"
"Kiddin', I'm kiddin'! I'm grateful to ya, really! Thanks a bunch, pal!"
